text:
The resources listed below provide information on tanning products that are regulated as cosmetics.
For information on tanning beds and booths, which are regulated as radiation-emitting devices and not as cosmetics, see Sunlamps and Sunlamp Products (Tanning Beds/Booths).
Sunscreens are regulated as drugs.Â Products intended both as makeup and sun protection are both cosmetics and drugs. To learn more, see "Makeup."
